<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/vector/search"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Search for similar items using vector similarity.

UIL Phase 3: Enables finding similar historical decisions, leads, or content.

Returns:
    List of similar items sorted by similarity (highest first).
